content: you can add length to the leg by knitting more rounds heel i used a modified german short row heel and the cc but you can use any heel type you like row are now worked for the first 28 32 36 st only = the heel stitches row 1 rs join cc k 28 32 36 st turn work sl1 make ds row 2 ws p 27 31 35 st turn work sl1 make ds row 3 rs k to previous ds turn work sl1 make ds row 4 ws p to previous ds turn work sl1 make ds repeat row 3 and 4 until you have 10 11 12 ds on each side and 8 10 12 stitches in the middle row 1 rs knit until you come to the end of the heel stitches make sure to knit the two legs of al the ds together bring your working yarn to the front sl next stitch purlwise to your needle wrap this stitch with your working yarn by bringing your yarn to the back turn your work sl wrapped st back to your other needle row 2 ws purl until you have purled all the stitches of the heel make sure to purl 3 the two legs of al the ds together bring your working yarn to the front sl next stitch purlwise to your needle wrap this stitch with your working yarn by bringing your yarn to the back turn your work sl wrapped st back to your other needle row 1 rs k 19 22 25 st turn work sl1 make ds row 2 ws p 9 11 13 st turn work sl1 make ds row 3 rs k to 1 stitch after ds turn work sl1 make ds row 4 ws p to 1 stitches after ds turn work sl1 make ds repeat row 3 and 4 until all heel stitches are worked you have now 2 ds stiches left you knit these when doing your first round of the foot cut cc yarn and work the foot in the mc foot round 1 continue with mc k to bor resolving the last 2 ds when you come across them round 2 k to bor repeat round 2 for the desired length about 2 5 cm less then your total foot length or as i measure it until my little toe is covered cut mc toe from this point i use the magic loop method to knit the toe round 1 join cc *k1 ssk k until 3 st left k2tog k1* repeat to bor round 2 k to bor repeat round 1 and 2 until you have 20 stitches left cut yarn leaving a long tail to graft the 2 sides together using the kitchener stitch weave in the ends and you are done 4
